column2: As the Time and Attendance Specialist you are responsible for overseeing and managing the timekeeping systems and processes within the organization. Policy Compliance: Ensure adherence to company policies and regulatory requirements related to attendance and timekeeping. Reporting and Analysis: Generate regular reports on attendance metrics, such as absenteeism rates, overtime hours, and time-off accruals.
